title: Cristiano Ronaldo sends boots to the ENTIRE Portugal Under 17 women's side
text:
Cristiano Ronaldo made the kind gesture of sending boots to the entire Portugal U17 women's side after they reached the elite round of Euro 2020 qualification.

The players read the letter out loud and were delighted to see the boots they received.

Ronaldo said in a letter to the Under-17 women's team: 'I send you these Mercurial Dream Speed boots in the hope that they help you reach your dream.

Cristiano Ronaldo has kindly sent boots to the entire Portugal U17 Women's side

The players read the letter out loud and were delighted to see the boots they received

'When I was a child I had a simple but very crazy dream. No, it wasn't the type of dream that you have when you are sleeping. This was one of those dreams that you want so much that it keeps you awake at night.

'I wanted to become the best footballer in the world. I dedicated my life to my dream - in the gym, on the training pitch - doing everything necessary to make it possible. It's so important to have a dream. It's even more important to work hard to reach it.

'I realised my dream and I hope you can realise yours too. Pursue them without hesitation. If I did it, you can do it too. Congratulations on qualifying for the elite round. Stay focused and keep your eyes on the next victory.

'Good luck and enjoy these boots.

'Cristiano Ronaldo.'

Ronaldo rewarded the team after they beat Latvia 4-0 thanks to a hat-trick by Ines Oliveira.

The Juventus star won the European Championships in 2016 with Portugal and the Nations League in the summer.
description: Cristiano Ronaldo has kindly sent boots to the entire Portugal U17 Women's side after they reached the elite round of Euro 2020 qualification.  Ronaldo rewarded the team for their heroics.
